0011010000101010 1101011000111011 1 -> sum: 0000101001100110, cout: 1
0101100000101100 0110111000011101 1 -> sum: 1100011001001010, cout: 0

0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
